summary: This mod completely restores the rarity and constant utility of unique artifacts found in previous Elder Scrolls games by greatly increasing their gold value, de-leveling them, and restoring enchatments from previous games.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that restores the rarity and constant utility of unique artifacts found in previous Elder Scrolls games by greatly increasing their gold value, de-leveling them, and restoring enchatments from previous games. No longer is it just daedric junk that you sell for a pocketful or gold nor a weak weapon you could easily replace with your own custom enchanted weapon. 

Questions I Estimate Will Be Asked

Q: Why are some artifacts that had a lower price in Oblivion so high in this mod? 
A: I take Morrowind as my pricing guide for all artifacts, since the devaluing of artifacts started in Oblivion. I take a rough medium between high priced and low priced artifacts from Morrowind to price returning Oblivon and Daggerfall artifacts. 
Q: Why are some of the items like Bloodskal (Dragonborn) and Hircines Ring so inexpensive? 
A: Because that was their price in Morrowind, I estimate Hircines was because the ring itself is cursed and only for werewolves. Bloodskal on the other hand was a very different and arguably less powerful weapon in Bloodmoon.
Q: Aren\'t these a little overpowered?
A: Thats the fun in it, that what made something special about finding an artifact in Morrowind :-DDD. I made this mod with my Encounter Zone Deleveled Skyrim in mind. 

Credit to Hanabi for Keening\'s passive script
author: JarlBroGruf
